description: Welcome to Worthing Green. A bright, welcoming townhome made for family living in beautiful Westwood Plateau. The main floor features an open layout perfect for connection, with a spacious kitchen, cozy deck — ideal for kids, pets, and easy summer dinners outside. Upstairs, you’ll find three comfortable bedrooms, including a peaceful primary retreat with an ensuite, while the walk-out basement adds even more space for a playroom, media room, or guests. Set across from Hampton Park and Elementary, near trails, shopping, and golf — this is the kind of home where families settle in and stay for years. Roof replacement completed this year!
